name: Coin Golf
description:
Flick your coin to navigate and avoid obstacles and magic traps (or use them to your advantage) to reach the goal and claim victory!

Inspired by the minigames of the Fable series, Coin Golf is a simple yet fun puzzle game where you have to reach the end of the level before you run out of shots. Each level also contains three hidden coins to collect. Getting these before and reaching the goal before you run out of shots may prove to be a bigger challenge than expected...  


  • 18 Levels designed to test the players skill
  • Magical obstacles that twist gameplay on its head
  • Beautiful 3D Visuals
